entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64 unwinder missing support for pac_sign_lr #90500
  • [mono] Tests `System.IO.Hashing.Tests.Crc32Tests` crashing on tvos-arm64 #90499
    8.0.0
  • .net 7.0 perf regression with stopwatch #90498
  • [mono] Tests failing `System.Globalization.Calendars.IOS.Tests` on ios-like platforms #90497
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Many libraries tests failing due to `The type initializer for 'DynamicDelegateLightup' threw an exception` on tvos-arm64 #90494
    8.0.0
  • Allocation for a simple isinst pattern in Tier0 #90492
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketOptionNameTest.MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_XXXXX_Succeeds failing #90491
  • AggressiveOptimization is reported as Tier1 #90490
    9.0.0
  • CLR crashing when running RemoteExecutor tests locally on Debug builds #90485
  • [Feature Proposal]: Provide the infrastructure to ease proxying the call to an object #90483
  • [WASI] wasiconsole template: Instructions in generated README.md incorrect #90482
  • something like initial JVM heap size need for GC heap size in dotnet #90481
  • [API Proposal]: `Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder` without parameter API #90479
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ConfigureHostOptions` extensions for `IHostApplicationBuilder` #90478
  • Question: xml escape/unescape characters #90477
  • JsonNode.GetPropertyName/GetElementIndex exception message misleading #90474
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe shutdown and EventPipeEventDispatcher aren't coordinated properly #90472
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.NotImplementedException in ComWrappers.TryGetOrCreateObjectForComInstanceInternal on NativeAOT #89713
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: support IReferenceTrackerHost #85137
    9.0.0
  • Tests.System.TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer test failure #87477
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled Exception in Pipeline Execution Thread,Exception #59460
    Future
  • System.Math.Pow does not return the correct answer if x is negative and y is 0 #90475
  • [browser][MT] legacy JS interop needs GC boundaries on main thread too #90044
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf failure with ` Compiling function #5058 failed: not enough arguments on the stack for i64.extend_i32_u (need 1, got 0) ` #82608
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm][AOT] Using Array.Sort falls back to the interpreter #81403
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][AOT] emcc : error - received SIGKILL (-9) #89402
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml`, and `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly` tests breaking for AOT on rolling builds #85013
    8.0.0
  • Bad performance with Blazor WebAssembly even when using AOT compilation #69797
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize is intolerably slow in Blazor WebAssembly, but very fast in .NET Core integration test #40386
    8.0.0
  • [wasi/wasm] dotnet workload search output has placeholder text in en-US.utf-8 locale #90207
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Review all Task Warnings and Errors for correctness and clarity #53627
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] icu.dat file size increase - SoD Regressions in New Blazor Template - Publish and Pizza App - Publish #57294
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • HttpClientFactory stop cleanup timer on dispose #90503
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [mono][arm64] Fixed passing/receiving hfa structures with fixed buffers. #90502
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix VersionWithType Crossgen2 check for parameterized types #90501
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Handle side-effects in impBoxPatternMatch #90496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make TimeProvider Delay Continuations Synchronously #90489
    needs-area-label
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90487
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Improve error message in the new `JsonNode.GetElementIndex()` and `GetPropertyName()` methods. #90486
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Cache the output of `mono-aot-cross --print-icall-table` #90476
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Natvis visualization for threadstatic variables. #90473
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable nullable on Hosting.Systemd #90495
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fixing COM Aggregation and XAML reference tracking on .NET AOT #90283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix TimeProvider Test #90448
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90456
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [wasm] Incremental build improvements #90194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Symbolicate function names on debug callstack #90348
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Respect `AppendRuntimeIdentifierToOutputPath`, and `UseArtifactsOutput` #90365
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [MonoVM] Change how toggle refs are reported in gcdump #90467
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add NonGC documentation #90206
    needs-area-label
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Align V512 reads in IndexOf. #90177
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unspill normalize-on-load variables using exact small type #90318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer to warn if primary constructor parameters are mutated #69489
  • Type inference fails for lambda expression returning collection expression #69488

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #50045
  • Perf improvement: caching #50044
  • Should this property be removed or marked as Obsolete? #50043
  • Add a `cancellationToken` for `WebApplication.RunAsync` #50042
  • No logs for System.NET #50041

Closed

  • Async code fails when called from OnInitializedAsync #49888
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #50018
  • Yup, this is by design. Starting in 3.1, authorization attributes are handled by the [authorization middleware](https://github.com/BrightSoul/AuthorizationHandlerMultipleInvocations/blob/master/Startup.cs#L63) instead of being evaluated by MVC's authorization filter. However if you explicitly add an `AuthorizationFilter`, it would get separately executed. #49900
  • Calling Minimal API with IFormFile gets "Invalid anti-forgery token" #49929
  • Empty render when using [RenderModeWebAssembly(false)] in .NET 8 Preview 7 #49949
  • Conditional css class syntax in blazor #50035

PullRequests

Created

  • Update IdentityModel 7.0.0-preview2 & Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.2 #50046
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, community-contribution

Updated

  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2242393 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add benchmarking documentation #50027
    Docs, needs-area-label
  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF + LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Provide Selectors for Certificate Chain Components #49789
    area-security, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages #48698
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Animation on Opacity Issue #16729
  • Date format error for September #16728
  • WebView does not support setPointerCapture when mouse leaves the control #16727
  • Context menu not displaying on Mac Catalyst with BlazorWebView #16726
  • Binding OnIdiom inside IsVisible causes crash in release mode #16725
  • RadioButton initialisation makes multiple groups unusable #16724
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform - Binding a property after an animation fails #16723
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform Label control - Multiple properties #16722
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform CheckBox control 'IsChecked' #16721
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Binding Issue: Multiple platform Slider control 'Value' #16720

Closed

  • NavigationPage - InsertPageBefore forces visibility of the NavigationBar #6936
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CollectionView cut off #7326
    Backlog
  • [Android] Soft Input Resize doesn't properly resize #7369
    Backlog
  • Attempting to run on iOS device gets doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-ios/ios-arm64' error #8272
    Backlog
  • Switching the MAUI Controls Gallery to RTL causes the currently visible view to not resize correctly #9702
    Backlog
  • Maui Application running throws FileNotFoundException (iOS) #10821
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.81] label created dynamically in code doesn't stretch like it should #14588
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Image with FontImageSource shows nothing after switching between the applications #15669
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI with .NET 8] Can't run on Android/iOS #15849
  • Maui - SwipeView not working with Editor control in iOS #15975
    Backlog
  • iOS - CollectionView incorrect behaviors #15977
  • "playsinline" attribute not working in HTML5 video tag for iOS #16013
  • DatePicker runtime error during DateSelected event #16022

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update WebNavigationResult.cs doc comments #16710
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
